chunk:
TRNR Skin Prebiotic Lipid Nourishing Moisturizer

Brand: TRNR Skin

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coconut Alkanes, Squalane, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Glyceryl Stearate, Methylheptylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Sodium PCA, Sclerocarya

(Sunflower) Seed Wax, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Glyceryl Stearate, Methylheptylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Sodium PCA, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil,
Sodium Gluconate, Xanthan Gum, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil Extract, Inulin, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Citric Acid

Directions: Apply liberally to the face and neck, massaging in until absorbed. Apply morning and evening.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
